TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITypeLibConverter

summary.span: 관리되는 어셈블리를 COM 형식 라이브러리로 변환하거나 반대로 변환하는 서비스 집합을 제공합니다.

span.span: Provides a set of services that convert a managed assembly to a COM type library and vice versa.

MemberSignature.Value: public object ConvertAssemblyToTypeLib (System.Reflection.Assembly assembly, string typeLibName, System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibExporterFlags flags, System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibExporterNotifySink notifySink);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ConvertAssemblyToTypeLib(class System.Reflection.Assembly assembly, string typeLibName, valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibExporterFlags flags, class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibExporterNotifySink notifySink) cil managed

public: System::Object ^ ConvertAssemblyToTypeLib(System::Reflection::Assembly ^ assembly, System::String ^ typeLibName, System::Runtime::InteropServices::TypeLibExporterFlags flags, System::Runtime::InteropServices::ITypeLibExporterNotifySink ^ notifySink);

span.span: The assembly to convert.

param.name: typeLibName
param.span: 결과로 만들어지는 형식 라이브러리의 파일 이름입니다.

span.span: The file name of the resulting type library.
A value indicating any special settings.
The interface implemented by the caller.
Converts an assembly to a COM type library.
An object that implements the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 대 한 자세한 내용은 `ITypeLib`, MSDN 라이브러리의 기존 해당 설명서를 참조 하십시오.For more information on `ITypeLib`, please see its existing documentation in the MSDN library.

span.span: Converts a COM type library to an assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder ConvertTypeLibToAssembly (object typeLib, string asmFileName, int flags, System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibImporterNotifySink notifySink, byte[] publicKey, System.Reflection.StrongNameKeyPair keyPair, bool unsafeInterfaces);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder ConvertTypeLibToAssembly(object typeLib, string asmFileName, int32 flags, class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibImporterNotifySink notifySink, unsigned int8[] publicKey, class System.Reflection.StrongNameKeyPair keyPair, bool unsafeInterfaces) cil managed

Public Function ConvertTypeLibToAssembly (typeLib As Object, asmFileName As String, flags As Integer, notifySink As ITypeLibImporterNotifySink, publicKey As Byte(), keyPair As StrongNameKeyPair, unsafeInterfaces As Boolean) As AssemblyBuilder

public: System::Reflection::Emit::AssemblyBuilder ^ ConvertTypeLibToAssembly(System::Object ^ typeLib, System::String ^ asmFileName, int flags, System::Runtime::InteropServices::ITypeLibImporterNotifySink ^ notifySink, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ publicKey, System::Reflection::StrongNameKeyPair ^ keyPair, bool unsafeInterfaces);

span.span: The object that implements the interface.
The file name of the resulting assembly.
A value indicating any special settings.
interface implemented by the caller.
A array containing the public key.

param.name: keyPair
param.span: 공개 및 개인 암호화 키 쌍을 포함하는 개체입니다.

span.span: A object containing the public and private cryptographic key pair.

param.name: unsafeInterfaces
param.span: 인 경우 권한에 대한 링크 시간이 검사되어야 합니다.

span.span: If , the interfaces require link time checks for permission.

param.span: 인 경우 스택 워크가 필요하고 비용은 더 많이 들지만 더 많은 보호 기능을 제공하는 런타임 검사가 수행되어야 합니다.

span.span: If , the interfaces require run time checks that require a stack walk and are more expensive, but help provide greater protection.
Converts a COM type library to an assembly.
An object containing the converted type library.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool GetPrimaryInteropAssembly (Guid g, int major, int minor, int lcid, out string asmName, out string asmCodeBase);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool GetPrimaryInteropAssembly(valuetype System.Guid g, int32 major, int32 minor, int32 lcid, [out] string& asmName, [out] string& asmCodeBase) cil managed
Public Function GetPrimaryInteropAssembly (g As Guid, major As Integer, minor As Integer, lcid As Integer, ByRef asmName As String, ByRef asmCodeBase As String) As Boolean

public: bool GetPrimaryInteropAssembly(Guid g, int major, int minor, int lcid, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % asmName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % asmCodeBase);

span.span: The GUID of the type library.
The major version number of the type library.
The minor version number of the type library.
The LCID of the type library.

param.name: asmName
param.span: 반환이 성공적이면 g와 관련된 주 interop 어셈블리의 이름입니다.

span.span: On successful return, the name of the primary interop assembly associated with g.

param.name: asmCodeBase
param.span: 반환이 성공적이면 g와 관련된 주 interop 어셈블리의 코드 베이스입니다.

span.span: On successful return, the code base of the primary interop assembly associated with g.

summary.span: 지정된 형식 라이브러리에 대한 주 interop 어셈블리의 이름 및 코드 베이스를 가져옵니다.

span.span: Gets the name and code base of a primary interop assembly for a specified type library.

returns.span: 주 interop 어셈블리가 레지스트리에 있으면 이고, 그렇지 않으면 입니다.

span.span: if the primary interop assembly was found in the registry; otherwise .
